text: The sixth edition of La Course by Le Tour de France, a women's cycling race held in France, took place on 19 July 2019. == Route and organization == The race started and finished in Pau, taking in five laps of a hilly circuit covering 121 km. It was held before stage 13 of the men's 2019 Tour de France, which used one lap of the circuit as an individual time trial. The event was organised by ASO, which also organises the Tour de France. It was the 15th race of the 2019 UCI Women's World Tour. == Results == ==See also== * 2019 in women's road cycling ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 UCI Women's World Tour 2019 Category:2019 in French sport La Course
title: 2019 La Course by Le Tour de France
